CustomField.formula: vlocity_cmt__Address1__c & BR() & IF( ISBLANK(vlocity_cmt__Address2__c), "", vlocity_cmt__Address2__c & BR() ) & IF( ISBLANK(vlocity_cmt__City__c), "", vlocity_cmt__City__c) & IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK(vlocity_cmt__City__c)), OR( NOT(ISBLANK(vlocity_cmt__State__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(vlocity_cmt__PostalCode__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(vlocity_cmt__Country__c)))), ", ", " ") & vlocity_cmt__State__c & " " & vlocity_cmt__PostalCode__c & BR() & vlocity_cmt__Country__c
CustomField.label: Address
